<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Remove Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=252)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 363 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

With a touch, you ease a creature's fears. You can attempt to counteract a single fear effect that the target suffers from. This frees only the target, not any other creatures under the fear effect.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
name: Remove Fear
